name: LEAVE (estherc123)
description:
You got stuck and you need to leave. hOw? By changing the object's material. Yes, conservation of energy and mass holds no more!

Credits:

  • Esther Cai: Designing and implementing puzzles.
  • Nathan Patreaca: Sounds, Visual effects and Game Mechanics.
  • Anke Shao: Implementing puzzles.
